about.about: The surface area of Mimas is slightly less than the land area of Spain. Mimas's most distinctive feature is a giant impact crater, named Herschel after the discoverer of Mimas.
about.discovery: Mimas was discovered by the astronomer William Herschel on 17 September 1789.
about.name: Mimas is named after one of the Giants in Greek mythology, Mimas.
